00011 #include <net-snmp/net-snmp-config.h>

00014 #include <string.h>
00015 #else
00016 #include <strings.h>
00017 #endif

00019 #include <net-snmp/net-snmp-includes.h>
00020 #include <net-snmp/agent/net-snmp-agent-includes.h>

00024 #if HAVE_DMALLOC_H
00025 #include <dmalloc.h>

00027 
00053 netsnmp_mib_handler *
00054 netsnmp_get_debug_handler(void)
00055 {
00056     return netsnmp_create_handler("debug", netsnmp_debug_helper);
00057 }
00058 
00060 void
00061 debug_print_requests(netsnmp_request_info *requests)
00062 {
00063     netsnmp_request_info *request;
00064 
00065     for (request = requests; request; request = request->next) {
00066         DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "      #%2d: ", request->index));
00067         DEBUGMSGVAR(("helper:debug", request->requestvb));
00068         DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", "\n"));
00069 
00070         if (request->processed)
00071             DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "        [processed]\n"));
00072         if (request->delegated)
00073             DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "        [delegated]\n"));
00074         if (request->status)
00075             DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "        [status = %d]\n",
00076                         request->status));
00077         if (request->parent_data) {
00078             netsnmp_data_list *lst;
00079             DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "        [parent data ="));
00080             for (lst = request->parent_data; lst; lst = lst->next) {
00081                 DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", " %s", lst->name));
00082             }
00083             DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", "]\n"));
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00090 int
00091 netsnmp_debug_helper(netsnmp_mib_handler *handler,
00092                      netsnmp_handler_registration *reginfo,
00093                      netsnmp_agent_request_info *reqinfo,
00094                      netsnmp_request_info *requests)
00095 {
00096 
00097     netsnmp_mib_handler *hptr;
00098     int             i, ret, count;
00099 
00100     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "Entering Debugging Helper:\n"));
00101     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "  Handler Registration Info:\n"));
00102     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Name:        %s\n",
00103                 reginfo->handlerName));
00104     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Context:     %s\n",
00105                 (NULL == reginfo->contextName)
00106                 ? "NULL" : reginfo->contextName));
00107     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Base OID:    "));
00108     DEBUGMSGOID(("helper:debug", reginfo->rootoid, reginfo->rootoid_len));
00109     DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", "\n"));
00110 
00111     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Modes:       0x%x = ",
00112                 reginfo->modes));
00113     for (count = 0, i = reginfo->modes; i; i = i >> 1, count++) {
00114         if (i & 0x01) {
00115             DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", "%s | ",
00116                       se_find_label_in_slist("handler_can_mode",
00117                                              0x01 << count)));
00118         }
00119     }
00120     DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", "\n"));
00121 
00122     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Priority:    %d\n",
00123                 reginfo->priority));
00124 
00125     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "  Handler Calling Chain:\n"));
00126     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "   "));
00127     for (hptr = reginfo->handler; hptr; hptr = hptr->next) {
00128         DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", " -> %s", hptr->handler_name));
00129         if (hptr->myvoid)
00130             DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", " [myvoid = %x]", hptr->myvoid));
00131     }
00132     DEBUGMSG(("helper:debug", "\n"));
00133 
00134     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "  Request information:\n"));
00135     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Mode:        %s (%d = 0x%x)\n",
00136                 se_find_label_in_slist("agent_mode", reqinfo->mode),
00137                 reqinfo->mode, reqinfo->mode));
00138     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Request Variables:\n"));
00139     debug_print_requests(requests);
00140 
00141     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "  --- calling next handler --- \n"));
00142     ret = netsnmp_call_next_handler(handler, reginfo, reqinfo, requests);
00143 
00144     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "  Results:\n"));
00145     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Returned code: %d\n", ret));
00146     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "    Returned Variables:\n"));
00147     debug_print_requests(requests);
00148 
00149     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:debug", "Exiting Debugging Helper:\n"));
00150     return ret;
00151 }
00152 
00157 void
00158 netsnmp_init_debug_helper(void)
00159 {
00160     netsnmp_register_handler_by_name("debug", netsnmp_get_debug_handler());
00161 }
